contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Super soft yet supportive, this pillow provides the perfect support for a great night’s sleep. Featuring 650 fill power classic white down, a 100% cotton sateen shell and two densities to choose from, you’ll finally get the night’s sleep you deserve.
contentfulProduct.title: Premium Down Pillow
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $99

content.value: Super soft yet supportive, this pillow provides the perfect support for a great night’s sleep. Featuring 650 fill power classic white down, a 100% cotton sateen shell and two densities to choose from, you’ll finally be able to get the night’s sleep you deserve.
Classic white down
100% cotton sateen shell
Responsible Down Standard Certified
Double stitched edges with German piping for durability
Made in the USA of imported materials
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. Use mild detergents only. Tumble dry on lowest heat setting until completely dry. Option to professionally dry clean.
